clean_data: IT Support Technician IT Support Technician IT Support Technician ProTek Carbondale IL I have earned a Master Degree in Quality Engineering and Management I have a passion for manufacturing especially in the Automotive industry My objective is to achieve the high quality management system and reduce manufacturing costs using data and statistical analysis I have two SixSigma quality levels of products Creating PPAP Analysis and Quality artifacts for stakeholders as well as providing weekly reports for monitoring process efficiency and quality Also I worked as an
